FROM HER FAMILY: Frances, our Mom and best friend, passed away on January 9, 2009. Our most sincere thanks to those of you who contributed -in memoriam- to keep her KIVA project ongoing.  She truly believed that helping people one-to-one was the most rewarding thing one could do in life.  

Plant a bean... get a bean.

lenders.name: anonymous
lenders.loan_because:
What goes around comes around!

Even though it seems like a small contribution to me ($25) when I pool together with others, it makes a very large contribution to the lives of people across the globe!
lenders.occupational_info:
I work with people who are living with major mental health issues.

It's challenging, fulfilling, and wonderful work!

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because:
25 years ago I started a business with $50.00.
I struggled for many years to build a business and support my family at the same time. A small loan like this would have helped me immensely. 

I am glad to be able to loan money to another person to start a business.

I really like loaning to Samoa. I traveled to Western Samoa as a teenager with my parents to help with an Earthwatch program. Earthwatch provides scientists with people who pay to help them do a study.  I loved Samoa and have a special place in my heart for the people there.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an artist who makes Arts dolls and paints at festivals.

lenders.name: Maureen
lenders.loan_because: Such a little thing for me can make a very big difference for someone lse

lenders.name: Claus
lenders.occupation: Development Manager Customer Focus Group, EPP

lenders.name: Jacob
lenders.loan_because:
Economic opportunity offers the promise of better living by building stronger communities, safer neighborhoods, and hope for future generations.

We can continue to break down the barriers that often divide our communities by showing our support and commitment to enrich the lives and well-being of all our neighbors, no matter who they are or where they come from.

Kiva helps me share the dream of prosperity.

lenders.name: SEI
lenders.loan_because: We are learning about the most impactful ways to help to reduce poverty through micro-finance and other social entrepreneurship initiatives
lenders.occupational_info: Using business platforms as a means to end poverty

lenders.name: Natty
lenders.loan_because:
I can and we should


"That until the philosophy which holds one race superior and another inferior is finally and permanently discredited and abandoned: That until there are no longer first-class and second class citizens of any nation; That until the color of a man's skin is of no more significance than the color of his eyes; That until the basic human rights are equally guaranteed to all without regard to race; That until that day, the dream of lasting peace and world citizenship and the rule of international morality will remain but a fleeting illusion, to be pursued but never attained; And until the ignoble and unhappy regimes that hold our brothers in Angola, in Mozambique and in South Africa in subhuman bondage have been toppled and destroyed; Until bigotry and prejudice and malicious and inhuman self-interest have been replaced by understanding and tolerance and good-will; Until all Africans stand and speak as free beings, equal in the eyes of all men, as they are in the eyes of Heaven; Until that day, the African continent will not know peace. We Africans will fight, if necessary, and we know that we shall win, as we are confident in the victory of good over evil.

[...]

The problems which confront us today are, equally, unprecedented. They have no counterparts in human experience.  Men search the pages of history for solutions, for precedents, but there are none. This, then, is the ultimate challenge.

[...]

[W]e must look into ourselves, into the depth of our souls. We must become something we have never been and for which our education and experience and environment have ill-prepared us. We must become bigger than we have been: more courageous, greater in spirit, larger in outlook. We must become members of a new race, overcoming petty prejudice, owing our ultimate allegiance not to nations but to our fellow men within the human community."

Emperor Haile Selassie I 
- address to the United Nations, (New York, October 1963)

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I am so fortunate in my life and I want to help others achieve their goals.  KIVA has given us all a chance to do something for someone in need!  THANKS KIVA!
lenders.occupational_info: I manage and administer Microsoft networks.  I am also an Email Administrator and manage our spam/virusware/spyware software.

lenders.name: George
lenders.loan_because: I am very fortunate to have my own shop, tools and access to wood. By helping a fellow woodworker support his family and achieve his dreams and  I can give back some of the abundance I have been lucky enough to receive.
lenders.occupational_info: I make bowls, platers and vases on a lathe from wood I harvest myself from urban trees that are being removed. Most of my work is for everyday use but I enjoy making art pieces.

lenders.name: Craig
lenders.loan_because: I have the means to change the world.

lenders.name: Doris
lenders.loan_because: I have so much and they need so little.

lenders.name: NG
lenders.loan_because: Genesis 4.9

lenders.name: Becky & Lyle
lenders.loan_because: of KIVA!  Thank you for the opportunity.

lenders.name: Sofia & Douglas

We have realised many of our dreams and it makes us very happy to help someone else turn their dreams into reality!
lenders.occupational_info: We provide training and software development to companies. Though we are zealous about our work, it is also a means to be able to do the things we feel very passionate about.

lenders.name: Crysta
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others in need.  I am very blessed in my life and would like to help those who need a little blessing themselves.  We are all here to take care of each other.  Kiva.org is such an easy way to make a huge difference in someone's life!
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of other people's children at my house while they are at work. I also attend college full time working towards a Psychology degree.

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: Banks tend to not lend to people in need.
lenders.occupational_info: Very enjoyable

lenders.name: DAB
lenders.loan_because: Pablo Neruda said, "There is no insurmountable solitude."

lenders.name: Benny & Ing-Britt

lenders.loan_because: I think this is the best way to help people

lenders.name: Erling

lenders.occupational_info: Past owner of a small business

lenders.occupational_info: i sit at a desk all day and i spend a lot of time on the computer trying to figure out how i can help others.

lenders.name: Don

lenders.name: Donna (& Carl)

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because:

  ~ John F. Kennedy
lenders.occupational_info: I recently retired from teaching to give palliative care to my parents. I have 3 grown children.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I like to help other achieve their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: Pharmaceutical

lenders.name: Marissa Roybal
lenders.loan_because: I believe everyone is entitled to have enough of everything they need for themselves and their families, and I would like to be a small part of making that happen.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm lucky to have a position with an organization that I love and enjoy!

lenders.name: Dad & Danika
lenders.loan_because: I feel it puts money directly in the hands of people who want to work to better their lives. I involve my daughter in the decisions to teacher her about helping others.
lenders.occupational_info: My company designs and builds special machines used in the manufacturing industry.  I am responsible for sales.

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.occupation: retired with a small horse farm

lenders.name: John DeGrood
lenders.loan_because:
If you have food in your fridge, clothes on your back, a roof over your head and a place to sleep - You are richer than 75% of the world.
If you have money in the bank, your wallet, and some spare change - You are among the top 8% of the world's wealthy.
If you woke up this morning with more health than illness - You are more blessed than the million people who will not survive this week.
If you have never experienced the danger of battle, the agony of imprisonment or torture, or the horrible pangs of starvation - You are luckier than 500 million people alive and suffering.
If you you can read this message - You are more fortunate than the 3 billion people in the world who can not read it at all.

lenders.name: Lorna
lenders.loan_because: I like to feel I am making a difference in the world and love to help people who want to help themselves
lenders.occupational_info: I teach yoga by helping people get in touch with there spirit.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: It is the best way to help each other move toward a more equitable and sustainable world.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach people how sustainability is the essential foundation for conditions of our own possibility as a species, world and planet.

lenders.name: Mireille
lenders.loan_because: I can be an active participant in our Global Community and help empower those less fortunate make a better living.  Thank you KIVA.

lenders.name: Edward
lenders.loan_because: I want to help redistribute wealth and prosperity on Planet Earth

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: Such a small amount of money goes so far in other countries. How can I not give someone a chance to change their life for what it costs me for a single lunch at a restaurant?
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired from working on designing websites and making programs that train people, using a computer. Since I retired I have been designing silver jewelery.

lenders.name: Francine
lenders.loan_because: I used to work in international development so this is an alternate way of helping out.
lenders.occupational_info: Quality assurance for internal and public communications for Canada's Department of National Defence.

lenders.name: Ronald
lenders.loan_because: I want to put on More housing on my Pigs farm and to dis  a Bore hole so that i have access to water  full time
lenders.occupational_info: We're two peoples basically and started on an Agrovet Firm. We keep animals like Pigs and Chicken birds. Its called "Kayo-Kasolo Agrovet Firm". Sofar we have over 120 Pigs and the production output is hindered by lack of water on the farm and lack of animal house

lenders.name: Maria
lenders.loan_because: "For of those to whom much is given, much is required"

lenders.name: Allen
lenders.loan_because: I like to make my limited income last and try to leverage the most out of it.  Kiva allows that.  Not to mention the journals and other things I might learn through this process.
lenders.occupational_info: Community Advocate, 26 year AIDS survivor, peer advocate.  Encouraging others to be the best that they can be.  Have learned alot about survival and living well with aids.

lenders.name: Katie
lenders.loan_because: I'm trying to expand my global perspective.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a community foundation, where citizens donate, we invest and grow the money, and give it back out to students and nonprofits via grants and scholarships

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel to good to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people save money for when they are older.

lenders.name: Robert & Family
lenders.loan_because: My wife and I are very blessed to have the ability to help others get their lives on track, and if we can help people improve their lives, then this is the most wonderfull way to do what we can to help.  Teaching our 3 children to love life and take care of fellow people is the best thing we can do in life.  God bless everyone!!!!!!!
lenders.occupational_info: I evaluate credit risk for home loan applicants and pre approve them for a mortgage on thier home.

lenders.name: Mary Kay & Pat
lenders.loan_because: giving always comes back in our lives and it is a priority in my life.
lenders.occupational_info: I help others purchase their homes.

lenders.name: Kathi
lenders.loan_because: I can!
lenders.occupational_info: I train volunteers to tutor refugee students in homework clubs.

lenders.name: Steve

lenders.name: Lala
lenders.loan_because: I care

lenders.name: Mari Anne & Roger
lenders.loan_because: People have helped me, now I can help others.
lenders.occupational_info: Concierge in a senior's independent living apartment. Teacher in an online high school.

lenders.occupational_info:
Investors in real-estate,we buy houses, renovate and rent them out.
We love working in our own business.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: My blessings runs over.
lenders.occupational_info: I help build software projects that help businesses.

lenders.name: Marlene
lenders.loan_because: it just makes so much sense ...
lenders.occupational_info: I help families to find their strengths to become healthier and happier.

lenders.name: Alice Anne
lenders.loan_because: To whom much is given, much is expected.  I want to share the joy of giving with my children.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a mom who devotes many hours to volunteering in the classroom.  I love watching my children learn, stretch, and grow.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: we should all share our bounty - that's what it's for.  The more important question is why doesn't everyone?

lenders.name: Judith
lenders.loan_because: I've travelled extensively and seen and such struggles This is a means of making a meaningful contribution.
lenders.occupational_info: .I enable people in their spiritual journey.

lenders.name: Joseph
lenders.loan_because: I wish to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm retired.

lenders.name: Kai

I wish all people on our small planet could live in abundance. 

Kiva enables me to reach out and share some affluence. It just feels good!

lenders.name: Andreas
lenders.loan_because: I think KIVA has the right approach: help people to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I help making software more secure so nobody can steal your personal or business data.

lenders.name: Alfred and Margrethe
lenders.loan_because: we think this seems to be a form of aid that works in the long run
lenders.occupational_info: We're both students, Margrethe in medicine and Alfred in philosophy

lenders.name: Sheila
lenders.loan_because: I want people to know that American's care about others.  That we all are just mom's and dad's trying to support our families.
lenders.occupational_info: My family owns a manufacturing company.  I work because I LOVE it.  It not only supprts my family but the families of our 80 employees.

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.loan_because: Why not?  A way to help people around the world gain opportunities, financial stability, and have their business help many others in turn?  I am sure MANY people have an extra $25 they can LOAN.  The ability to be reimbursed for your loan, or the ability to have your donation keep on giving to more and more people?  An amazing opportunity for us all.

lenders.name: Frank
lenders.loan_because: I am so blessed, this is a small way of showing my gratitude. I love the idea that others, through their efforts and with a little help, are able to follow their dreams and better their lives.

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: Develop community strategies for a better Calgary

lenders.name: Bananarama
lenders.loan_because: I WANT TO MAKE A REAL DIFFERENCE IN PEOPLE'S LIVES

lenders.name: Al & Nancy
lenders.loan_because: We've travelled & met lots of nice people around the world.  I always like to support people growing food.
lenders.occupational_info: We live in a small house on Vancouver Island and we travel a lot.  We spend time with our family.

lenders.name: Ellen
lenders.loan_because: It matters so much to be able to help other people, and everytime you get paid back you can give it to someone else, so a very small amount can just keep on going and going to help lots of people. One of the best things I've ever found in life was Kiva.

lenders.name: Claire
lenders.loan_because: When I was 8 years old, I saw a World Vision documentary on the famine in East Africa and it touched my heart. From then, I have been especially sensitive to people who suffer and have come to realize how important women/mothers are to world. If they do well, their children do well and indirectly, the world benefits. Also, everyone has the right to be able to provide, in the very least, the basic necessities to their family.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for private social service agency that focuses on family development.

lenders.name: Arthur
lenders.loan_because: I am most interested in doing what I can to assist others that have skills that will lead to the fulfillment of a life goal. If self sufficiency is achieved, all the better.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the director of a small social service agency that provides direct services to families and children.

lenders.name: Christopher
lenders.loan_because: I like helping other to help themselves.     I believe that you can Teaching a person to fish but this will only give them  the knowledge, but providing them with fishing equipment will give them the ability
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a rural area of Newfoundland canada in the Emergency Medical field.

lenders.name: Wes & Rachel
lenders.loan_because: I think it's a great way to help out people in need and actually know where your money is going.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with computers and support a facility with 700 employees.

lenders.name: Maggie and Emilie
lenders.loan_because: "I expect to pass through life but once.  If therefore, there be any kindness I can show, or any good thing I can do to any fellow being, let me do it now, and not defer or neglect it, as I shall not pass this way again."  ~William Penn

lenders.name: Hogwarts Elite
lenders.loan_because: We as a community of Harry Potter fans knew that we could pool our resources and talents to raise money and use our love of Harry Potter to help others. We have selected Kiva.org as our charity of choice for our very first fundraiser, and are looking forward to helping out!
lenders.occupational_info: Hogwarts Elite is a community of Harry Potter fans on Live Journal with members ranging from 13 well on up to 40 and beyond. Members are sorted into houses and come together for discussion, contests, and socialization.

lenders.name: Skip
lenders.loan_because: it's the right thing to do

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: I appreciate the difficulties trying to find people to inspire you and help take the step towards creating your independence
lenders.occupational_info: Selling products that people enjoy and want to return for. Making the whole experience a positive and rewarding one

lenders.name: Darren and Christina
lenders.loan_because: Returning the favor

lenders.name: Jane
lenders.loan_because:
"You may never know what results come of your actions, but if you do nothing, there will be no result."
Gandhi
lenders.occupational_info: I am a hospice volunteer.

lenders.name: dpb
lenders.loan_because: I want to help make a positive change in the world
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a domestic violence shelter as a legal advocate. I help women obtain divorces and protective orders from their abusive partners.

lenders.name: Joakim
lenders.loan_because: I know that a little can go a long way. And I want to know that I have had an impact (how ever small) in changing the outlook for real people somewhere on our globe.
lenders.occupational_info: Right now, getting the tools to be able to change the world later on.

lenders.name: Troxel and Kelia
lenders.loan_because: We applaud and support anyone who takes personal responsibility for making their way through this world. We have been blessed by God, and want to share our blessings with others.

lenders.name: Sadia and Yasmin
lenders.loan_because: leading by example is the best gift I can give to my daughter. Our humanity is what we all need to take responsibility for. As a mother, I see the struggles of all mothers. As a daughter and a sister it is the same. What happens to your family happens to my family. If I can help one person, the effects can be limitless.
lenders.occupational_info: I have worked for people that I believe in, in order to make life better for others. I only work for people and in places I enjoy and it must always be in service for others, for that is the greatest gift.

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.loan_because:
A man once asked God "Why is their so much poverty and suffering in the world? Why dont you send someone to help?"

God replied, "I did. I sent you."

Thats why I give...
lenders.occupational_info: I help manufacture spinal braces for DeRoyal industries. Our braces help restrict movement and allow patients to heal quickly from traumatic spinal injuries.

lenders.name: Kathy & John
lenders.loan_because: This is a wonderful opportunity to give thanks.
lenders.occupational_info: We have spent our working lives assisting persons with severe brain disorders - mental illness and mental retardation.

lenders.name: Sabrina
lenders.loan_because: I saw this on Oprah and thought this was a great opportunity to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm home schooled and I play soccer

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: As my grandfather often said, "If someone needs your help, and you have the ability to help them, then help."  He was right; it really is as simple as that.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people find the simplest, most cost-effective way to do the work they need to get done.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: it makes a difference.

lenders.name: stephen
lenders.loan_because: all loans in the world should be interest free

lenders.name: Brett
lenders.loan_because: I like to help others
lenders.occupational_info: Very Busy

lenders.name: The Greens
lenders.loan_because: We loan because we want to make a difference in the world.  We want the world to know that Americans are generous and caring.

lenders.name: Kerrie
lenders.loan_because: I am grateful to be in the position to do so and I know the small amount I loan can make a world of difference to somebody.
lenders.occupational_info: I care for sick and premature babies.

lenders.name: Francesca
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to make their lives better and if you can help someone do that- you should!

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: I want to give back to others less fortuate than myself. I see miro-loans as a better way of helping as it is a means to empower people rather than having them rely on handouts.
lenders.occupational_info: I care for troubled youth in my community and hope to give them an opportunity to live up to their true potential.

lenders.name: Corina
lenders.loan_because: I care and I believe in giving people a chance.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a non profit organiztion that builds homes for low income families - Habitat for Humanity

lenders.name: Ryan and Jasmine
lenders.loan_because: I love.

lenders.name: Steve from Toronto
lenders.loan_because: I see this as being a far greater benefit to the individuals in need rather than a donation to charity that takes 90% in administration fees.

lenders.name: Martin
lenders.loan_because: 'The longest journey begins with a single step.' Small busnesses and their entrepeneurs can be an important vehicle in moving a region to an improved standard of living. I will do what I can to contribute to this
lenders.occupational_info:
My company helps the not-for-profit sector in Canada manage their donor base by processing their donations. 

We also help our magazine publishing clients realize their sales objectives

lenders.name: Jan
lenders.loan_because: I want to enable, encourage and support the dreams and amibitions of others throughout the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Lutheran Pastor.

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.occupational_info: I write for television in Los Angeles.

lenders.name: Morley
lenders.loan_because: I believe in giving people a hand up in bettering their circumstances.

lenders.name: Rita
lenders.loan_because:
I believe in gratitude and paying it forward. I know teaching or helping someone to accomplish their dream
makes the world a happier and more peaceful planet.
lenders.occupational_info:
I spend my time mentoring and helping people however I can. I believe in the idea of teaching a person a trade or supporting a new business that will enable a fellow brother or sister be able to support themself and their families. This is the truly powerful way to help end poverty and help feed the people of the world. People are grateful for a hand up and usually turn around and pay it forward to someone else 
seeking to improve their circumstances in life. I'm grateful for Kiva providing such an opportunity for me to make a small difference in others lives.

lenders.name: Mike & Anaël
lenders.loan_because: We strongly believe in sharing with and helping individuals achieve their own personal goals.  We like the idea of directly lending to individuals since we know how the money will be used.  Everyone should have the opportunity to better their own lives through entrepreneurship, irrespective of where they come from.  It is our goal and belief that that every citizen of the world, no matter where they come from, should have an equal opportunity to improve their own lives.
lenders.occupational_info: Mike is an estate planning and probate attorney in Stuart, FL.  Anaël is studying to become a project management engineer in Lyon, France.

lenders.name: Joe
lenders.loan_because: It can make a big difference to somebody in need of help.
lenders.occupational_info: Just the right thing to do to. The more we share - the more we grow.

lenders.name: Skoot
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: David J. Andrews
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of loaning seed money to help start or grow a business.  By creating a sustainable source of income, I have the hope of helping others lift themselves and their families out of poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I help not-for-profit organizations improve their fund raising capability and their program operations.  In addition, I coach young managers in their supervisory and/or program administration skills.

lenders.name: Garry Webb
lenders.loan_because: A little help can sometimes make a big difference

lenders.name: Chad
lenders.loan_because: I don't need to win the lottery to be a philanthropist I can participate right now and that is what it is all about.  Helping those you can.

lenders.name: Nicolai
lenders.loan_because: I think it's exciting to see that my money is making a difference and i feel that i make a small difference.
lenders.occupational_info: i'm in the military.

lenders.name: Robert Dauphinee
lenders.loan_because: A little bit can go along way...We are all related on this planet and we should share the wealth and resource with all. It only takes a small contribution to make a large difference in someone's life.
lenders.occupational_info: Professional Engineer for rural municipal government in Canada.

lenders.name: Vern & Leanne
lenders.loan_because: I believe that an individual is responsible for their own well being, but quite often that person just needs a boost- someone to believe in them enough to offer a helping hand- some encouragement
lenders.occupational_info: I worked on all different kinds of machinery to keep things going and my wife Leanne is a retired nurse.

lenders.name: Nicole
lenders.loan_because: it's the right thing to do. Simple as that.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a seventh grade student in Texas who likes to make a difference in the world around me.

lenders.name: Cheryl
lenders.loan_because: I wanted to make a small difference in somones life.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a registered nurse.  My job is to help people get better when they are sick.  I currently work in a prison full time and a nursing home with the elderly part time.

lenders.name: Max
lenders.loan_because:
It's something i can do. 

I think i should do whatever i can to build better world. I do less than i would like, but this is too easy not to do.
lenders.occupational_info: i enjoy the good fortune/curse to be only any good at making pictures and telling stories.

lenders.name: Cho Family
lenders.loan_because: We want to help other entrepreneurs get started - to make a living for themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I run the business of making websites and games online.... web marketing.  My husband works for an internet music download company.

lenders.name: Janey & Kyu
lenders.loan_because: We want to make a difference

lenders.name: NotariesExpress
lenders.loan_because: Pay it Forward!!!
lenders.occupational_info: We provide loan document signers for real estate transactions throughout USA

lenders.name: kelly
lenders.loan_because: it feels good to help someone who may need it more then me

lenders.name: R J A
lenders.loan_because: it's the right thing to do
lenders.occupational_info: I have worked for forty yers and now retired, meaning I don't work anymore.  I was an operating room nurse and a State investigator. I loved my work. I enjoy helping people.

lenders.name: Jyoti
lenders.loan_because: I am grateful for the opportunities I have. Each and every single human being must get a chance at fulfulling their dream.

lenders.name: Uri
lenders.loan_because: I am grateful for being fortunate, and thus want to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I study Latin American history.

lenders.name: Tim
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance for a better life.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a doctor.

lenders.name: Yuri
lenders.loan_because: Little by little we'll help everyone

lenders.name: Sharonn
lenders.loan_because: Growing up in developing countries (Philippines and Zambia), I saw firsthand how empowering it is to have your own business.  This is my way of paying it forward.

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: I want my children to learn the joys of giving.  Help them realize that there are other sides to this comfortable world in which they are growing up.

lenders.name: Brenda & Eric
lenders.loan_because: It seems like a wonderful opportunity for investing in the future.
lenders.occupational_info: Brenda is a university professor.  Eric is a firefighter.

lenders.name: ania
lenders.loan_because: I am a human being

lenders.name: Rebecca
lenders.loan_because: I hope it makes a difference for the better in lives of people who might not be able to borrow otherwise.

lenders.name: Moises
lenders.loan_because: we must eliminate world poverty and oppression, and unite the working class.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach in an elementary school in the inner city of Los Angeles where I was born and raised.

lenders.name: Bruce
lenders.loan_because: I love the idea of helping hard working individuals who are seeking loans to run a business.

lenders.name: Stuart
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I like to help others in the same profession as myself.
lenders.occupational_info: I drive customers from place to place using a car as my taxi service.

lenders.name: Alec
lenders.loan_because: give a man a fish, and he'll eat for a day... teach him to fish, he'll eat for a lifetime.
lenders.occupational_info: I do research on human visual perception.

lenders.name: Tristan
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves an opportunity~

lenders.name: Kim
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate, and grateful for the help in my life.
lenders.occupational_info: I design or translate logos and various graphics for clients, and make clothing, accessories, signs, banners, decals etc.

lenders.name: Henry Family
lenders.loan_because: life is not about being a more satisfied shopper.  it's about being a contribution and making an impact on people.
lenders.occupational_info: i help people understand and fall in love with what technology can do for them.

lenders.name: Shannon
lenders.loan_because: I believe we should all help each other...

lenders.name: Brett and Elise
lenders.loan_because: We like Kiva because you facilitate loans (not handouts) to people who might otherwise not be able to get them. This kind of transfer of money can really help to stimulate entrepreneurial activity. We also really like that NO INTEREST is charged. This is especially important for Muslim recipients.
lenders.occupational_info: Brett designs accounting software and Elise takes care of everything else - LOL!

lenders.name: Luk Arbuckle
lenders.loan_because:
I believe in the value of helping people help themselves.  With regards to effectiveness, “the fact that [microcredit] has survived commercially, I take that more seriously than any other piece of evidence” (Tyler Cowen, economics professor at George Mason University, and blogger at Marginal Revolution).  In other words, there is demand for the services offered by microfinance institutions.

This is a part of my pledge to donate at least 5% of my gross income to charities helping the poor, as part of an effort to lead an ethical life (as described in Peter Signer's book The Life You Can Save).  A large portion of my charitable contributions will go to Médecins Sans Frontières / Doctors Without Borders and organizations ranked highly by GiveWell, with a small portion going to local charities helping people in my community.

lenders.name: Lea-Rae
lenders.occupation: potter, yoga teacher, music fest director
lenders.loan_because: When I started my business I had a young child and no credit. I was able to obtain a loan through a group that helped mothers in particular. Without this loan my business probably would have failed and because of it my life has changed so much for the better. Sometimes we have big dreams and just need a little help to realize them. It feels so great to know that this small gesture will directly benefit people who are determined to make their lives better.
lenders.occupational_info:
~I own a demonstrating pottery studio/retail store. 
~I teach yoga and am a Phoenix Rising Yoga Therapist (mind/body connection therapy).
~I am a director of Starbelly Jam Music Festival, a 2 day music fest in the Kootenays (BC) every July for 10 years!
~I recently raised $20,000 in 6 months as part of a challenge by "Off the Mat, Into the World" and travelled to Cambodia to work with the Cambodian Children's Fund. As a group we raised over $500K for the CCF. I recommend going to Cambodia and really immersing yourself in the culture and learning the history. You will want to go back.
www.myspace.com/starbellyjam
www.offthematintotheworld.org
www.cambodianchildrensfund.org

lenders.name: ashley
lenders.loan_because: I care

lenders.name: Oakley
lenders.occupation: Dog, my pet master is Videographer, Minister, etc.

lenders.name: Bryce
lenders.loan_because:
Life's most urgent question is: What are you doing for others?
--from MLK Jr.
It is every man's obligation to put back into the world at least the equivalent of what he takes out of it.
--Albert Einstein
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a plant that manufactures electronic components.

lenders.name: Whitney
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people in need.  Kiva is an empowering program to build confidence and opportunity in those who would not otherwise have a chance to improve their circumstances.

lenders.name: Justin
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy sharing what I am fortunate enough to have with others.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm studying medicine

lenders.name: Hannah
lenders.loan_because:
Matthew 25:40- The King will reply, "I tell you the truth, whatever you did for one of the least of these brothers of mine, you did for me."

Good comes from God and only from Him.
lenders.occupational_info:
I just wanted to add a note that a fellow christian graciously reminded me of today:
"Pray for God's creation and His children. Yes these loans will help many grow and strengthen lives; however,
most importantly is each recipient salvation and personally knowing our Lord and Savior Jesus Christ.

Please take a moment to pray for all your loan recipients by name. Today may change your and their life forever.

In His beautiful and Holy Name"
Posted by anonymous
Sep 22, 2008 - 8:47 pm PDT
Thank you.

lenders.name: Gail
lenders.loan_because: I believe in a helping hand rather than a handout.
lenders.occupational_info: I develop and price insurance products.

lenders.name: Charlene
lenders.loan_because: I root for social justice and believe in giving people a hand up not just hand outs.  I think everyone deserves the opportunity to develop a useful skill set, the dignity of being able to work for a living, and the ability to provide for their family.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm just a student who spends a lot of time reading and thinking about social issues via multiple disciplines such as economics, government, sociology, anthropology and religion.  I would like to translate my knowledge into action, because I believe faith and good works go hand in hand, especially when it comes to loving your neighbor as yourself.

lenders.name: Ariadne
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people in countries that have less support for the disadvantaged.
lenders.occupational_info: I support people from rural areas with mental illnesses, over the phone.

lenders.name: Lumina
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy serving in ways that uplift and empower.
lenders.occupational_info:
"Choose kindness whenever it's possible. It's always possible." ~ The Dalai Lama

"Work is Love made visible"~
    Kahil Gibran

"May the beauty you love be what you do"
    ~ Rumi

lenders.name: Charles
lenders.loan_because: People in the developing world need the money more than I need more unnecessary consumables
lenders.occupational_info: IT Analyst Programmer, designing and developing financial software

lenders.name: randy
lenders.loan_because: It's great to know that a small loan can make a big difference to those in need. The satisfaction comes in seeing those grow and prosper to make a better life for their families. It's a powerful way to reach out and help others. I encourage everyone to spread the word. We can all make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a real estate investor.

lenders.name: Stephanie
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy using the Kiva search engine to find and to help fellow widows.

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: It feels good to do so little to help so many.

lenders.name: CHRISTOPHER
lenders.loan_because: I want to help all people succeed. I know that it only takes a little help to change the world.

lenders.name: Sébastien De Vos
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: Selling air :)

lenders.name: Diane & William
lenders.loan_because: I have the ability to help and show my son that people can make a difference when their not caught up in their own selfish worlds.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach!  I learn!  I teach!

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.loan_because: This probably the most meaningful, rewarding, and influential loan I can afford to lend.
lenders.occupational_info: Student

lenders.name: dorothy
lenders.loan_because: because I'd like to make a little difference to someone's ability to succeed in what they want to do
lenders.occupational_info: I help adults to improve their reading, writing and maths especially those who did not gain any qualifications when they were younger

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: It is a great opportunity to help entrepreneurs pursue their business ambitions and strengthen the economy of their community.
lenders.occupational_info: I help with studies on fire ecology.

lenders.name: Derek
lenders.loan_because: Jesus blesses me and gives me the opportunity to give something to people that want to do something to improve their own lives and that of their families and community. It will enable these people to have and make choices in their lives that may have just been out of reach.

lenders.name: Brenda
lenders.occupational_info: I specialize in Alzheimers and Palliative Care. I assist chronic and terminally ill people to stay in their own home.

lenders.name: Arne-Michael
lenders.occupation: Research assistant and freelance code monkey
lenders.loan_because: I am happy to be able to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: Finding better ways to test software.

lenders.name: Di and Ross
lenders.loan_because: Everyone should have a right to affordable and appropriate finance/credit.  Microfinance is one of the best ways to help people out of poverty and improve their families lives.

lenders.name: Dennis & Anya
lenders.loan_because: We loan because we care enough to share.

lenders.name: Jason and Kerry
lenders.loan_because: We feel tremendously lucky to have grown up with economic security, and we want children around the world to have that freedom as well.
lenders.occupational_info: We work with children.

lenders.name: Jan-Willem
lenders.loan_because: I'm convinced that trying to make your life better by setting up your own business is far more satisfying than waiting for someone to help you out of your bad situation.
lenders.occupational_info: Real Estate administration and reporting
